Version 1.0 - Effective until April 7, 2025

IMPORTANT: READ CAREFULLY BEFORE DOWNLOADING, INSTALLING, COPYING, OR USING THE SOFTWARE

This Temporary End User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a single entity) and LatticaAI Inc. ("Licensor") for the software package identified above, which includes computer software and may include associated media, printed materials, and electronic documentation (collectively, the "Software").

BY DOWNLOADING, INSTALLING, COPYING, OR OTHERWISE USING THE SOFTWARE, YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT, DO NOT DOWNLOAD, INSTALL, COPY, OR USE THE SOFTWARE.

1. GRANT OF LICENSE
   This is a TEMPORARY, NON-EXCLUSIVE, NON-TRANSFERABLE, REVOCABLE license to download and use the Software solely for evaluation purposes. This license explicitly DOES NOT permit any other use of the Software.

2. RESTRICTIONS
   a. You may NOT use the Software for any commercial purpose.
   b. You may NOT redistribute, sell, rent, lease, sublicense, or otherwise transfer rights to the Software.
   c. You may NOT modify, translate, reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or create derivative works based on the Software.
   d. You may NOT copy the Software except as expressly permitted by this Agreement.
   e. You may NOT remove any proprietary notices or labels on the Software.
   f. You may NOT use the Software in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair Licensor's services.
   g. You may NOT use the Software to violate any applicable laws or regulations.
   h. You may NOT publish any benchmark or performance tests run on the Software.

3. NO WARRANTY
   THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT. THE ENTIRE RISK ARISING OUT OF USE OR PERFORMANCE OF THE SOFTWARE REMAINS WITH YOU.

4. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
   IN NO EVENT SHALL LICENSOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF BUSINESS PROFITS, BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, LOSS OF BUSINESS INFORMATION, OR ANY OTHER PECUNIARY LOSS) ARISING OUT OF THE USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE THE SOFTWARE, EVEN IF LICENSOR HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.

5. TERMINATION
   a. This Agreement is effective until April 7, 2025 or until terminated by Licensor.
   b. This Agreement will terminate automatically without notice if you fail to comply with any provision of this Agreement.
   c. Upon termination, you must destroy all copies of the Software.
   d. Licensor reserves the right to replace this temporary Agreement with a permanent license agreement at any time.

6. GOVERNING LAW
   This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which Licensor is located, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

7. ENTIRE AGREEMENT
   This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and Licensor and supersedes any prior statements, representations, or agreements, whether oral or written.

8. CONTACT INFORMATION
   For questions regarding this Agreement, please contact: support@lattica.ai
